programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: 64 Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De Leconomie, Entreprises
programme.desc: Programme focusing on the story of a French company which takes up exporting and enjoys success in the international markets.

programme.title: 64 Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Linvite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64 Lessentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Satellites
programme.desc: Watches, speakers, toilets... Maestro takes a fascinating look at some of our most everyday objects, both old and new. How exactly to they work? What is their history?

programme.title: Mr Ks strange Christmas
programme.desc: Specialist in every type of breakdown, Agence Galactique travels the galaxy to assist its customers. Aboard their spaceship Toaster, Dany Oven, Apple and Zed work wherever theyre needed sorting out inhabitants problems in their own inimitable way: happy, cheerful and totally eccentric.

programme.title: Heres an armadillo
programme.desc: At 6 years old the cheerful mischievous Koumi dreams of knowing all the animals in the world. Thanks to her picture book, shes able to head off and meet them.

programme.title: Old ghosts
programme.desc: Wealthy Mrs. Muchmore lives in a manor with her beloved dog Bentley. One day, Scraggs the raccoon turns up disguised as a cat. Immediately adopted by the old lady, he becomes Taffy and laps up her attention. But Bentley is not fooled and decides to chase him off his territory.

programme.title: The Kidizz, feel great in the skin theyre in
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Ants in their pants
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: The punishment
programme.desc: Young Nubu is a little boy whos curious about everything but makes one blunder after another as he learns about life. Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: Alchemy
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: God and the toad
programme.desc: God and the toad are the best of friends. As a tribute to their friendship, God gives the toad every power. But the toad becomes arrogant and pitiless, eventually defying God himself.

programme.title: The music master
programme.desc: Paris, 1483. 16-year-old Quasimodo is a hunchbacked orphan. One day, the gypsy Esmeralda, with whom he is in love, finds herself in trouble. He sacrifices himself to save her and ends up in prison. And so begins a long series of adventures...

programme.title: Screams on the high seas
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, its a busy programme for everyone. But itll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: 7 Jours
programme.desc: 7 jours, a weekly magazine programme covering news on society and international events to know all there is to know... in French

programme.title: Falò
programme.desc: A news magazine show, Falò discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Objectif Monde Lhebdo
programme.desc: Report, inquiry, investigation ... Objectif Monde LHebdo, a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Televisions).

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Weekly summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables dOlonne.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote dAzur.

programme.title: #Helvetica
programme.desc: What values are dear to the heart of Switzerlands most influential figures? How do they see the country, its know-how and its successes? We meet some of those taking Switzerland to the top in the fields of economics, politics, science, culture...

programme.title: Sun (China)
programme.desc: Business school student, Sun Ruijun arrived in France at 22 and began training as a pastry chef with Alain Ducasse before joining the Paul Bocuse Institute. The chef today heads the Lyon restaurant La Table Wei, where she offers French-Asian fusion cuisine.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: A key figure from the world of sport looks back at a particular competition, a career, an outstanding moment.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: 400 Millions De Critiques
programme.desc: The first major cultural magazine for the French-speaking world, an original TV5MONDE concept, 400 millions de critiques (400 million critics) reviews French-speaking cultural news through the viewpoints of Belgian, Swiss, Canadian, Quebecker, and French journalists.

programme.title: An investigation into the land that feeds us
programme.desc: Frances soil is dry, crumbly and no longer teeming with living mini-beasts and micro-organisms. The cause: intensive farming. According to the European Soil Institute 80% of agricultural land is degraded and water reserves polluted. Everywhere, those who work the land are fighting to change farming practices.

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables dOlonne.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. Tendance XXI showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Arts and crafts special
programme.desc: The apartments of Louis XVs intendants in the Hotel de la Marine. Between art and interior decoration, designer Ingrid Donat blends style and material to perfection. Alexander McQueen: a personality expressed through mystical romanticism. Between poetry and transparency: Atelier Stokowski, or the adventure of three brothers, master glassworkers.

programme.title: Pain perdu
programme.desc: On todays menu: pain perdu (bread pudding) with pistachios and hazelnuts.

programme.title: Internationales
programme.desc: A major interview focusing on world news, proposed by TV5MONDE.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Taratata 100% Live
programme.desc: For almost 90 minutes, watch the greatest names on the French and international music scene appear one after the other. Unexpected duets and trios, first-time covers, new talents... Taratata 100% live has all the ingredients that have made it a success, with even more live performances.

programme.title: Meurtres A Marie-Galante
programme.desc: On Marie-Galante, a young special needs teacher is found drowned in the pond at Le Punch. Police Captain Ophelie Villedieu heads the investigation. Meanwhile, SRPJ Commander Leopold Lacarriere returns to his native island from Versailles to write a novel. His godson, who had threatened the victim, is amongst the suspects...

programme.title: elisabeth Vigee Le Brun
programme.desc: In the 18th century few women were able to join the Royal Academy of Painting and Sculpture, and work for Europes most important royalty. With her character of tempered steel and her talent, she became her Marie-Antoinettes official portrait painter.

programme.title: Le Pays Des Sourds
programme.desc: Jean-Claude, Abou, Claire, Florent and the others are profoundly deaf. They all dream, think and communicate through signs. What is their world like? Nicolas Philibert takes us deep into the land of silence, where sight and touch are so important.

programme.title: Fanfare
programme.desc: Jules, a 20 year-old fairground traveller, has experienced three powerful emotions and must be punished. He has the choice between either a mime or a brass band which will, for the next twelve months, appear each time he experiences one of his excessive emotions. He opts for the brass band.

programme.title: The watch
programme.desc: Watches, speakers, toilets... Maestro takes a fascinating look at some of our most everyday objects, both old and new. How exactly to they work? What is their history?

programme.title: Thin-skinned toaster
programme.desc: Specialist in every type of breakdown, Agence Galactique travels the galaxy to assist its customers. Aboard their spaceship Toaster, Dany Oven, Apple and Zed work wherever theyre needed sorting out inhabitants problems in their own inimitable way: happy, cheerful and totally eccentric.

programme.title: Heres a green woodpecker
programme.desc: At 6 years old the cheerful mischievous Koumi dreams of knowing all the animals in the world. Thanks to her picture book, shes able to head off and meet them.

programme.title: Word of honour
programme.desc: Wealthy Mrs. Muchmore lives in a manor with her beloved dog Bentley. One day, Scraggs the raccoon turns up disguised as a cat. Immediately adopted by the old lady, he becomes Taffy and laps up her attention. But Bentley is not fooled and decides to chase him off his territory.

programme.title: Head for the heights
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Call the doctor?
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. programme.title: The lungs of the planet
programme.desc: Young Nubu is a little boy whos curious about everything but makes one blunder after another as he learns about life. Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: Ball games
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: The squirrel and the hyena
programme.desc: The hyena is starving and tries to talk the squirrel into coming down from his tree. But the squirrel is even more cunning and waits for a hunter to pass and catch the hyena at his own game.

programme.title: Eagle eye
programme.desc: Paris, 1483. 16-year-old Quasimodo is a hunchbacked orphan. One day, the gypsy Esmeralda, with whom he is in love, finds herself in trouble. He sacrifices himself to save her and ends up in prison. And so begins a long series of adventures...

programme.title: How time pffflies
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, its a busy programme for everyone. But itll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: Special programme: going green for a weekend in Angers
programme.desc: For this special programme, Jerome heads to Angers to join Stephane Marie and Carole Tolila, from the programme Silence, ca pousse. programme.title: Zaros (Crete)

programme.title: Un Dimanche A La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. programme.desc: Explorer, ethnologist, humanist and writer, Paul-emile Victor is the man behind the French Polar Expeditions (EPF) in 1947. He also understood before anyone else how much the north and south poles are indicative of climate change. A journey on his trail starting from Brest, the headquarters of the EPF.

programme.title: Urban forests

programme.title: Robert Le Vigan, La Cavale Dun Maudit
programme.desc: From Quai des Brumes to Goupi Mains Rouges, Robert Le Vigan (1900-1972) is one of the emblematic supporting actors of French cinema. Poetic, tortured, impossible to categorise, the actor was also Celines best friend and a Nazi collaborator during German occupation. We look back over his career.

programme.title: The Last Steep Ascent
programme.desc: In his youth, Miu Tin encountered bride-to-be Koo Sun-Yuet, who has lingered in his mind ever since. Twenty years later, the two meet again.

programme.title: Super Trio - Christmas Special 2024
programme.desc: TVB Jade brings you endless entertainment with concurrent dramas and sitcoms, as well as the latest news, variety and infotainment programmes from TVB.

programme.title: Scoop 2024
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: No Poverty Land IV - One Belt One Road
programme.desc: This programme explores seven countries along the Belt and Road, while also interviewing Chinese builders who have contributed in various projects, building railways, bridges and ports, and also providing technology to local people and bringing warmth to the poor.

programme.title: J Music
programme.desc: In each episode, popular singers are invited as guests, and they select their favourite works, performing with the live band to share their music with fans.

programme.title: Our Theme Songs
programme.desc: Enjoy classic drama theme songs that you may wish to listen to again and again, with modern arrangements giving these songs a new lease of life.

programme.title: Finance Magazine 2024
programme.desc: Finance Magazine closely follows the market, Hong Kong stocks trends and the property market situation. Through interviews with industry insiders and market analysis, it explores the hot topics in Hong Kong and international finance.

programme.title: Scoop 2024
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.desc: Good Morning Hong Kong brings you the latest news that matter to you.

programme.desc: In his youth, Miu Tin encountered bride-to-be Koo Sun-Yuet, who has lingered in his mind ever since. Twenty years later, the two meet again.

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies
programme.desc: This show brings on doctors and Chinese medicine practitioners to discuss diseases that the elderly should pay attention to, and provide prevention and treatment methods.

programme.title: Hands Up
programme.desc: This childrens programme encourages children to ask questions, express themselves, and move towards their goals!

programme.title: Connecting Earth And Sky
programme.desc: This show invites well-known artists from different industries to step out of their comfort zones and embark on a journey full of challenges and surprises.

programme.title: News Treasury 2024
programme.desc: News Treasury 2024 takes everyone to uncover news from the treasure house. In addition to past specials, live broadcasts and reports, there are also precious clips from iconic events that have never been exposed.

programme.title: Call Of Destiny
programme.desc: Fang Ri Jin unexpectedly connects with Xing Ke Lan, who is in a future timeline and trapped in a crisis. Is fate already predetermined? Will Ri Jin choose to compromise, or will he take a leap of faith to rewrite the destiny?

programme.title: Scoop 2024
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Eyes On Concern Groups
programme.desc: There are many types of online groups, with various topics like food, entertainment, hobbies and relationships attracting the attention of netizens. Our hosts follow some highly-popular groups in depth, discussing and fact-checking the information.

programme.title: Global View
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every day.

programme.title: Hands Up
programme.desc: This childrens programme encourages children to ask questions, express themselves, and move towards their goals!

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Sword and Fairy 1
programme.desc: Adapted from game Chinese Paladin, the story follows Li Xiaoyao, a waiter with hero dreams, and Zhao Linger, a descendant of Nuwa. They face challenges in search of the Spirit Pearl, courageously embarking on a journey to save the world.

programme.title: Connecting Earth And Sky
programme.desc: This show invites well-known artists from different industries to step out of their comfort zones and embark on a journey full of challenges and surprises.

programme.title: Europe Go Go Go!
programme.desc: Following a tour in London and Manchester, Sisley Choi sets out again to visit the three major regions of the UK including England, Scotland and Wales. She will also fly a little farther to Italy to visit the latest and most fashionable hotspots.

programme.title: No Poverty Land IV - One Belt One Road
programme.desc: This programme explores seven countries along the Belt and Road, while also interviewing Chinese builders who have contributed in various projects, building railways, bridges and ports, and also providing technology to local people and bringing warmth to the poor.

programme.title: Cantoxicating! (Sr. 3)
programme.desc: Travel around markets, old shops, restaurants and other places to discover the origins of interesting Cantonese idioms, and learn about local culture and customs.

programme.title: The Legend of Xiao Chuo
programme.desc: Xiao Yanyan and Han Derang are childhood sweethearts, but get separated when she is sent to the palace as the consort of Yelu Xian. With wit and dedication, she transforms into the most powerful woman in the Liao dynasty.

programme.title: News At 18:30 and Global View
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every evening at 6:30pm.

programme.title: Ring Ling Ling
programme.desc: Mak Ling Ling is a Feng Shui master and an actor. She has been involved in different fields such as business, acting and fortune telling. Stay tuned and listen to the unique insights of Ling Ling and various guests on the show!

programme.title: The Ringmaster
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-hei’s boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: The Last Breakthrough
programme.desc: Dr. WONG PO FUN (CHEUNG KA FAI, NICK) joins "Life Force

programme.title: Vigilante Force
programme.desc: Serious Crime sergeant, AH (LAM, BOWIE), grew up in a village in the New Territories. He is well respected by his colleagues. He works hard hoping to earn a promotion. One day, the headquarters appoints a superior, YIN (MA TAK CHUNG, JOE), to his division, killing all his hope. AH gets along with his colleagues. YIN is straight with his subordinates. Who will gain more co-operation from their colleagues? _x000D__x000D_AH devotes himself to work.

programme.title: Word Twisters Adventures
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, Des father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17)
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: The Sky is the Limit
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mother’s pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: Life Made Simple

programme.title: My Ages Apart
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: The Sky is the Limit
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mother’s pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. programme.title: Word Twisters Adventures
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, Des father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: The Ringmaster
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-hei’s boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.
